lenders.occupational_info:
The SOCIAL DECK is an independent social marketing agency passionate about helping organisations communicate and engage with individuals and communities.
We work across government, not-for-profit, industry, start-up businesses and social enterprises on projects that can help to make a difference to people’s lives. Our goal is to bring these sectors together to think about and implement new ways of engaging people and communities in actions that can improve personal well-being or help tackle bigger social and environmental issues. Our approach is to help facilitate action and change behaviours using practical engagement tactics and partnerships.

Most of my students are English learners, so they also have to learn the language along with all the curriculum. I love my job and could not think of anything else I'd rather do.

lenders.name: Richard & Renee
lenders.loan_because: My wife is from Thailand and we own a small home in the Suphanburi Province. We have visited Cambodia many times through work with our charity. On every visit we've been received warmly by the people of Cambodia, so we try to help as much as we can.
lenders.occupational_info: We have been blessed in life and strongly believe in paying it forward.

lenders.name: Quinn
lenders.occupational_info: I record video of events and make DVD's to sell to the performers.  We also do advanced video editing, promotional videos, weddings and everything in-between.

lenders.name: tyehimba
lenders.loan_because: these loans are a hell of a lot more deserved than the $700 billion loans given to the US banking industry!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English and write poems.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: Opportunity is everything.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student.

lenders.name: Makalika
lenders.loan_because: you only have limited opportunities to do something that helps someone dramatically AND is fun, easy, and relatively cheap.

lenders.name: Coz
lenders.loan_because: a small drop in a big ocean is better than no drop at all.

lenders.name: Carol 97756
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping women across the world help themselves.  A loan repaid is self-perpetuating
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer as a long-term care ombudsman and with adult education classes to promote nutrition, food preservation and safety.

lenders.name: Fisher Girl
lenders.loan_because: My mommy and daddy are teaching me that helping others is really important.

lenders.name: Dino & Matt
lenders.loan_because: We love to travel the world and have been treated very kindly by people we meet in our travels.
lenders.occupational_info: Dino is a writer.  Matt helps design cities.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of peoples children while they work.

lenders.name: katie
lenders.occupational_info: I also work as a volunteer with La Leche League Canada helping other mothers who are looking for breastfeeding information and support.

lenders.name: Adolfo
lenders.loan_because: I am not a wealthy person, but I think money isn't  in appropriated way distributed across the world, So, I just want to help somebody to change his/her life with a small grain of sand.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Insurance Agent living in this wonderful country during the last 10 years

lenders.name: Ezra
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves. If I can help them build a sustainable economic future it will benefit them, their families, and their communities more than giving charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with large companies to help them understand people.

lenders.name: One Million Dollar Team
lenders.loan_because:
I want to change the world and make a positive difference in the lives of others.  I also want to teach my students that nothing is impossible.  I want to show them that even they can make a huge difference in making the world a better place.  I even set the high expectation that our Kiva Team can even achieve loaning $1,000,000 with the help of others.  I teach the kids 2 mottos: 

Live simply that others may simply live. - Ghandi

We must be the change we wish to see in the world. - Ghandi
lenders.occupational_info: I have the greatest job in the world.  I have the opportunity to help kids achieve success and my goal is that they learn, have fun, and see the importance of being a good person.  There is nothing better than helping others and teaching them the importance of helping others.

lenders.name: Joni, Aaron, Gabe &Lulu
lenders.loan_because: We have lived in developing countries, and adopted our daughter from Vietnam - we know the impact a small amount of money can make on individual lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I are attorneys.  I help workers, and he prosecutes criminals.

lenders.name: Doreen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others be able to take care of themselves and their loved ones.  I have met so many wonderful, hard working people and I think we should all help each other to be able to better care for our families.

lenders.name: A New Team Adventure
lenders.loan_because: At our company, A New Team Advenure, we strive to give back to others in every way possible. this is one of those ways.
lenders.occupational_info: We help corporations do great things in the community by organizing projects where they can help those who need help.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others get started in a new business
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs grow their business

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women start businesses and be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: Discovering new opportunities.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: It helps people in their projects

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is the right thing to do....
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of several buildings...I do the cleaning, painting, carpentry and maintainance its fun and keeps me moving a lot.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of directly helping people and believe in the power of individual grassroots power to change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a recent engineering graduate and hope to use this through engineers without borders eventually.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an actor of theater and television and I'm currently working on my first novel (which is my main activity these days).

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I can help to make people's lives happier and to end vicious cycles of poverty.

lenders.name: Nanika
lenders.loan_because: courageous and hard working women should be encouraged and supported.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: i want to make a difference.....
lenders.occupational_info: i'm retired now...used to do factory work......

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I can.
Running a small risk to help people develop their businesses seems to be good in every way.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children age 7-16 when their regular teachers are sick or have other duties to attend to. That means I get around in all classes, substituting for all kinds of teachers in all kinds of classes.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to run their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computers work properly.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I have so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mathematics in a public high school.
